snippet.title: Car Hunt - (1979) - Arcade - gameplay
snippet.description:
Car Hunt
Sega © 1979 
[Coin-Op] Arcade Video Game
Emulator:  Mame 1.91

This was a two-pack arcade game... switch between Car Hunt & Deep Scan.  Both SEGA games.  In Car Hunt, we have the Sega version of the popular (for that year) Head-On type of game.  Collect all the dots while avoiding the other cars.

Honestly, this game was MORE like Pac-Man than Head-On, because you can pretty much change the direction of your car at any time.  I wonder if it even pre-dated Pac-Man?  Possible.
